title: When I am Dead, My Dearest - Christina...
text:
Thanks for sharing About.com with others! Most Emailed Articles 
Read the collected works of Christina Georgina Rossetti . More E-texts When I am Dead, My Dearest 
by Christina Georgina Rossetti 
When I am dead, my dearest, Sing no sad songs for me; Plant thou no roses at my head, Nor shady cypress tree: Be the green grass above me With showers and dewdrops wet; And if thou wilt, remember, And if thou wilt, forget. I shall not see the shadows, I shall not feel the rain; I shall not hear the nightingale Sing on, as if in pain: And dreaming through the twilight That doth not rise nor set, Haply I may remember,
